name: Cocoon Mech (Visual Novel)
description:
Version 2.0 

Changelog:  Added new animated scenes, New ending scenes, Choices, New Dialogue. 

An adventure visual novel game, inspired on scifi stories, mech's and personal struggles, it's a story based on Daiken a man trapped without a clear purpose or path. 

Original Soundtrack 

Original Art 

Original Story Around 30min of Story 

Updates will be coming soon adding more details and features.
